author: Andrew McGlashan
title: Michael Neser driven to be better by 'deflating' near misses with Australia
description: The Queensland paceman has been a regular in Test squads but is still waiting for that dream debut | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: It has become a regular sight around Australia Test squads: Michael Neser bowling over after over in the nets, troubling the best batsmen, then getting the tap on the shoulder from Justin Langer to say he would be carrying the drinks again. The pace attack, a… [+3675 chars]
